in the Valles de Echo and Ans贸 in the Spanish Pyrenees. The village is tiny but very pretty with its stone houses and views of the mountains around. It is also a great base for exploring the mountains and villages in the valley.

Best to have your own transport. The area is pretty and well suited for some strenuous biking but no local rentals are available.
